text: Wo que yi jiang shi [mu sa]“tao la te”, qizhong you zhinan he guangming, guishun [an la] de xianzhimen yi ci wei youtai jiaotu panjue.[Youtaijiao de] la bi he mushi ye yiyang [zai zhexie xianzhihou yi “tao la te” wei youtai jiaotu panjue], yinwei tamen fengming baohu an la de jingdian, qie yao wei ci zuozhengren, suoyi, nimen buyao haipa renlei, nimen dang weiju wo [zhu]. Nimen buyao yong wo de jixiang huanqu disu de daijia. Shei wei yi an la suo jiang shi de [jingdian] panjue, zhexie ren que shi bu xinyang zhe.
